definition: cotyledon of a bean (i.e. either of the halves of a bean seed that can be split apart after removing the seed coat)/thick bean sauce (abbr. for 豆瓣醬|豆瓣酱[dou4 ban4 jiang4])

sentences.english: And he has discovered many such grass-roots experts on douban. com.
sentences.chinese: 而且他在豆瓣網上已經找到了許多這樣的草根專家。

sentences.english: For comparison, participants in the other group weren't asked to eat watercress.
sentences.chinese: 相對比，在另外一組的受試者沒有要求喫豆瓣菜。

sentences.english: Peel and slice the avocado and add to bowl with watercress.
sentences.chinese: 把鱷梨去皮切薄片，和豆瓣菜一起放入碗中。

sentences.english: In China, it's found in black mushrooms, bean paste and dried shrimp.
sentences.chinese: 在中國，它的發現在香菇，豆瓣醬和幹蝦。

sentences.english: Experimental study of a bean paste flavonoids extraction and determination.
sentences.chinese: 實驗研究了豆瓣醬中黃酮類化合物的提取與測定。

sentences.english: Seasoning have SiChuan broad bean paste, Onions, green red pepper piece.
sentences.chinese: 調料有四川豆瓣醬，洋蔥，青紅椒塊。

sentences.english: Extracts from crushed watercress were also shown to inhibit the growth of breast cancer cells.
sentences.chinese: 粉碎豆瓣菜的提取物還可以抑制乳腺癌細胞的生長。

sentences.english: The Beef in Black Bean Sauce is quite flavoursome.
sentences.chinese: 豆瓣醬牛肉的口味蠻重的。

sentences.english: A bean in liberty is better than a comfit in prison.
sentences.chinese: 寧在自由中喫豆瓣，不在囚牢中享蜜餞。

sentences.english: But the issuance of fabaceous valve means is a character, ahead personnel looks not intuitionistic .
sentences.chinese: 但豆瓣的發佈方式是文字的，前方人員看起來不直觀。
